headline: 2 Stocks Down 40% and 72% to Buy Right Now
summary: It's been an absolutely wonderful performance stretch for the broader market, and hot tech companies including Nvidia, Palantir, and Apple have rocketed to new valuation highs.  Keith Noonan: Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD) is a designer of central processing units (CPUs) and GPUs for personal computers and data centers.  The company's stock is up roughly 182% over the last five years thanks to some solid business execution and excitement that the company could be poised to see some of the same explosive, AI-driven growth that has propelled Nvidia to stellar returns.

headline: Is Supermicro Stock a Buy in 2025?
summary: With shares down an eye-watering 71% from an all-time high of $119 reached in March, Super Micro Computer (NASDAQ: SMCI) trades at a substantial discount from its peak.  Shares are reeling after allegations related to the company's accounting practices and other challenges.  Let's dig deeper to see how the company might perform in 2025 and beyond.
